May 20, 2015

May Meeting - Lean Coffee

Thursday, May 28, 2015 from 7:00 AM to 8:30 AM

Register on EventBrite

Session:

This will be our first lean coffee in the Des Moines area . We are limiting seating to 10 attendees to keep it managable and to judge interest. We are charging a minimal fee (most of which is going to EventBrite) to cover your beverage (coffee, tea, or soda) and to test if it decrease “no-shows”.

Hope to see you there!

Location:

Machine Shed Restaurant
11151 Hickman Road
Urbandale, IA 50322

Facilitator:

Tim Gifford
